name: V7 - Keyboard - Bluetooth - US - black - retail

reviews.name: V7 Bluetooth 3.0 Portable Keyboard for Tablets and Smartphones
reviews.reviewText: This keyboard has excellent keypress feedback and can pair with my iPad, my Android phone, and even my Bluetooth-equipped laptop. It uses 2 AAA batteries, so it's much more convenient than having to recharge it - you can carry extra batteries and change them in an instant. Pairing was simple and quick and the keyboard is comfortable with good key spacing and all the functions you need. Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Great addition to tablet or phone

reviews.name: V7 Bluetooth 3.0 Portable Keyboard for Tablets and Smartphones
reviews.reviewText: These low-end products are notoriously unreliable, but this one works !
reviews.title: Bang for the buck

reviews.name: V7 Bluetooth 3.0 Portable Keyboard for Tablets and Smartphones
reviews.reviewText: Surface RT found and connected without any glitches. solid keyboard feel and superior to the Microsoft touch key panel. Outstanding value when comparable units are twice or more the price.
reviews.title: effective unit for Surface Tablet
